fields.name: HavocOS 6.0
fields.details:
Initial Build
- Configure SQLite to operate in MEMORY mode
- Remove IO read_ahead_kb tune
- Kill IMS log spam 
- Prefer hwcodecs for thumbnails
- Update SF props from cheetah 
- Compact and Allow cached app heaps in the background
- Set Correct INTERACTION uclamp value down to 50% 
- Boost schedtune during bootup 
- Add blkio tuning from sunfish 
- Improved Performance and Stability

#ROM #HavocOS #havoc #Unofficial #T #A13
HavocOS 6.0 | UNOFFICIAL | Android 13 | Poco M4 Pro 4G / Redmi Note 11S 4G

• Users with Global/CN ROMs based on Android 13 are required to disable signature verification, and it is recommended to use Core Patch LSPosed module.
• Magisk delta may not be compatible.

fields.name: Leica cam for AOSP (64/108MPX)
fields.details:
MIUI CORE IS NEEDED!!!

Installation:
Flash MIUI Camera (don't open it)
Reboot
Flash MIUi Core
Reboot
Now you can use MIUi camera

fields.name: MIUI CORE
fields.details: Needed for some miui apps to run in AOSP

fields.name: Fullscreen/Immersive Gesture
fields.details:
This Magisk Module lets you tweak Android 10-13's gestures.

Requirements
Android 10-13
Magisk 20+

Installation:
Flash the module
Select the desired options on the volume selector
Reboot
Enjoy!

Terminal Setup:
Run on a terminal app the following command su -c hn

fields.name: Unbrickez
fields.details:
This Module Have three options :
1. Run
2. Driver
3. SP Flash

fields.name: SP Flash Tool V5
fields.details: P flash tool is an application which mainly helps you to flash Stock ROM, Custom recovery and fixing in some extreme cases ( firmware update, Flash recovery, unbrick bricked Android device etc.). SmartPhone FlashTool is working with MediaTek Android smartphones (MTK based) You can Download SPFlashTool from our downloading section. You need to load scatter file for MTK based device for functioning.

fields.name: SP Flash Tool V6
fields.details: SP flash tool is an application which mainly helps you to flash Stock ROM, Custom recovery and fixing in some extreme cases ( firmware update, Flash recovery, unbrick bricked Android device etc.). SmartPhone FlashTool is working with MediaTek Android smartphones (MTK based) You can Download SPFlashTool from our downloading section. You need to load scatter file for MTK based device for functioning.

fields.name: MI Flash Tool
fields.details: The Xiaomi Flash Tool is completely free, thus removing the necessity for any payment to utilize this tool. Secure. The Xiaomi Flash Tools are 100% secure

fields.name: Magisk Delta V26.1
fields.details:
Magisk is a suite of open source software for customizing Android, supporting devices higher than Android 6.0.
Some highlight features:

- MagiskSU: Provide root access for applications
- Magisk Modules: Modify read-only partitions by installing modules
- MagiskBoot: The most complete tool for unpacking and repacking Android boot images
- Zygisk: Run code in every Android applications' processes

fields.name: Miui Launcher Mod CN-based
fields.details:
MIUI Launcher Mod v3F CN• MIUI 13/14 - A11+

Changelog:
• Based on china launcher 
• New UI interface.
• Added several new modifications.
• Fixed all bugs noticed in the previous update.


 (https://t.me/cringe_screenshots/208)Instructions:
• Download and flash the zip in magisk.
• Select if you want Monet or not (android 12+).
• Reboot the device.
• Now Enjoy.

About Android 13:
• Users with ROMs based on Android 13 are required to disable signature verification, and it is recommended to use Core Patch LSPosed module.

Notes:
• Magisk delta may not be compatible.
• If you use this in your ROM, please remember to credit our work.
• Not for paid ROMs.

Important:
Launcher mod is the one of the mod which consumes lot of time from me so please don't make another mod based on this work and let it remain however it is.
(If you all want future updates i.e.)
